history.proof: intros A a l H. apply in_rev. apply in_rev in H. strivial use: in_rev.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set a : A l : list A H : In a l The term "A" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "In ?b (?a :: ?l)".

In environment A : Set a : A l : list A H : In a l Unable to unify "rev (rev ?M1394) = ?M1394" with "(fix In (a : A) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | nil => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) a (rev l)".
In environment A : Set a : A l : list A H : In a l Unable to unify "In a l" with "In a (rev l)".

original: intros A a l H. apply in_rev. apply in_rev in H. apply (in_inv A a (rev l) a). apply rev_involutive. apply H.
